name: Outlaw Name Generator
description: Ready to embrace your inner rebel? This generator conjures up outlaw names that are as wild and untamed as the West itself. Perfect for games, stories, or just unleashing your mischievous side.
introduction: Forget boring names! You're not just another face in the crowd; you're an outlaw, a renegade, a legend in the making. This generator will give you the moniker you deserve, a name that strikes fear (or at least mild amusement) into the hearts of your enemies... or friends. So, saddle up and get ready to discover your outlaw identity!
howToUse: Marvel at the awesome outlaw name that appears before your very eyes.
Repeat until you find the name that perfectly captures your outlaw spirit (or until you get bored).
Use your new outlaw name for… well, whatever outlaws do. We're not judging.
Optional: Rob a bank. (Just kidding! Don't do that. We're not responsible for your actions.)

faqs.question: Is this generator actually going to make me an outlaw?
faqs.answer: No. This generator is for entertainment purposes only. Real outlawry involves things like breaking the law, which we strongly advise against. We're just here to provide cool names.

faqs.question: Can I use these names for my D&D character?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! In fact, we encourage it. These names are perfect for rogues, bandits, and any other character who likes to live life on the edge.

faqs.question: Are the names generated random?
faqs.answer: Yes, the names are generated using a combination of prefixes and suffixes. This ensures a wide variety of results, some more ridiculous than others (which is part of the fun!).

faqs.question: What if I don't like the name I get?
faqs.answer: No worries! Just hit the "Generate" button again for a brand new name. Keep trying until you find one that resonates with your inner outlaw.

faqs.question: Can I suggest words to be added to the generator?
faqs.answer: We're always open to suggestions! Feel free to send us your ideas. If we like them, we might just add them to the generator. Who knows, your word could become the next big outlaw sensation!

faqs.question: Is it safe to use this generator?
faqs.answer: Safer than robbing a stagecoach! This generator is completely harmless and won't steal your data or turn you into a wanted criminal (probably).
